column1: Visitation will be held on Sunday
column3: 2015 at Tres Hewell Mortuary from 1 to 3 p.m. Funeral services will be held on Monday
column5: 2015 at 2 p.m. at First Presbyterian Church in Seguin with Rev. Jim Price and Rev. Tom Jones officiating. Interment will follow in Guadalupe Valley Memorial Park.
